__e: The formula for the treatment is locked up in here, General.

You know, he's right about not giving them the formula.
I don't have the formula, how often must I tell you that?
If I find out this is because you don't have the formula and you think maybe I do, I'm gonna be seriously disappointed.
A formula that would make you incredible.
He wants the formula... that I was going to give him.
And I've got the formula that will stop it.
